name: Hack'n Coupe Coupe
description:
Hack'n Coupe Coupe is a small Hack'n Slash made as part of our studies at Télécom SudParis

Gameplay

A traditional Hack'n Slash, you can choose between 3 characters to play in a series of increasingly difficult waves. Each character possess 3 abilities that you can activate them via :
Mouse Left-click : main ability
Mouse Right-click : secondary ability
SPACE : ultimate ability

Each wave is randomly generated, so each playthrough is unique !

Team

Prométhée 'Akasuna' TONEATTI - Developer
Henri 'Biscuit Prime' NOMICO - Developer
Alexandre 'Flegmatik_surf' LAFERRERE - Developer

Assets Used

Low Poly Skeleton
Old Hand torch
Warrior Pack Bundle 3
